content: little crochet pouch using tunisian and regular crochet stitches what can you fit in the pouch -headphones -jewellery -coins and notes -keys that s a cute last minute gift idea and a product you can sell at markets materials -10gr / 25m of fine/ size 2 yarn - 4mm hook and one smaller eventually for the drawstrings - a tapestry needle eventually copyright this pattern is a creation of @jeanne crochets you may sell products created from this pattern but are not allowed to resell the pattern and charge for it
